General.Name: Tian Ruixiang Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Tian Ruixiang Holdings Ltd, together its subsidiaries, operates as an insurance broker in China. The company distributes property and casualty insurance products, such as automobile, commercial property, liability, and accidental insurance; and life insurance products comprising individual whole and term life, group life, and individual endowment life insurance, as well as health and miscellaneous insurance products. It serves individual and institutional customers. The company distributes its products through offline outlets, online platforms, and cross-industry cooperation. Tian Ruixiang Holdings Ltd was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
